metadata.name: While everyone was asleep...
metadata.description:
A Ukrainian woman cries out for help as her home, her life are disrupted by tanks, bullets and bombs of a crazy aggressor.
--->
A Russian artist, a beautiful human whose heart is broken by the violence initiated by its own "leader" Putin, its government, its army, asked me to mint and sell this and donate all the proceeds to Ukrainian causes.
speaking up. 
Because it's now a crime in Russia to oppose the war with Ukraine.
His own father is without work because of voicing opposition to Putin. 
He himself can be targeted and possibly jailed for publicly 
He is deeply sad and he wants to show his support for Ukraine, the way he can. 
He asks the world to support Ukraine and hopes that Russian people will be freed one day from its crazy autocratic kleptocratic government. Putin's Russian regime is the enemy of peace and freedom for the whole world. 
Together we can change this, we can help, in however small steps.
